name: Giggles' Big Adventure
description:
Giggles the Elf is invited to Rainbow Baby's birthday party, but he doesn't have a present yet! Play as Giggles as he goes on a quest to find Rainbow Baby the perfect gift. With the help of his friends and a magic time fairy, he just might be able to make it in time- but only if he looks in the right places!

Game Length: 10-15 Minutes
